Detailed Description

Hub of Sensor instances, performs sensor fusion.

Creates and holds referenses to all sensors whose data is to be integrated into the EKF instance also held by this class. All measurement values recorded by sensors are passed through the process_measurement() function where they are enhanced, e.g. by subtracting an initial position for the "differential mode"

◆ periodic_filter_time_delay_

double ackermann_ekf::SensorArray::periodic_filter_time_delay_
private

If no measurement has been seen for a while the EKF state is forcefully brought forward in time using its predict step. It is then brought forward to the time given by current_time - periodic_filter_time_delay_
